reviews.review: i wouldnt buy the game for full price anymore but when its on discount i would recommend it. the only reason i wouldnt buy it for full price anymore is just the state of the game with tons and tons of dlc plus the devs not really listening too the community but great game. hopefully the devs dont kill it

It's clear people are toxic in this game. It's clear when survivors try way too hard, and there are a lot of tryhard killers, but it's so much fun when you're just having fun with the game, as a killer or survivor.

Player toxicity takes a lot away from the charm of the game but I find myself having so much fun just being a killer and screwing around not taking things seriously and I take a lot of fun being a survivor and just being skittish and not so hard focused on winning. It's great.

The massive downside to this game is the wait times. I can't just hop on and play it seems. I'll be up 3am as the plague and waiting 10 minutes+ to match up with some people just so I can pee all over them. The game could definitely do better having some non-ranked match making or casual thing when you cant just set your own game up with friends. seriously.

The only multiplayer game I'm actually good at. Unlike the fighters and the shooters and what not, the one game I am good at also happens to be a great game. I initially wrote this game off as poo poo until Pat of Super Castle Beast talked about it and was the first game I bought when I got my new PC. Pyramid Head is my boy.
Meg Thomas looks life my ex-wife. I kill her first in every game and watch her life bleed out of her eyes as she dies on the hook.

I cant recommend purely because there is an odd mouse input lag. If you move you mouse it will drop you to 5-10 frames. There are multiple people with the same problem online, no fixes, no support from devs. Real bummer

10/10. Fun game. Makes me want to pull my hair out. An almost perfect game. Pretty unbalanced at the moment. Met a lot of cool new friends! Some really toxic community members. Go buy this game! Prepare yourself...

Love this game! So good be playing since 2018! People complain about different changes but a game that stands the test of time goes though many changes. I still have huge amounts of fun playing! Please don't let the jaded assholes that just want to play the same thing over and over with no changes to the meta tell you this is a bad game! It is awesome and worth more than they are asking for!
Really fun to play and great community for the most part. :)
